Description: Fragment perhaps from a 'kohl' jar: fragment from the base of a vessel, possibly a kohl jar, in dark-blue glass, glossy surface. The base is flat and circular. The small area of the body surviving rises from the outer edge of this base. The thread decorations, of irregular form, are in opaque yellow and white. Tan core. If this is indeed a 'kohl' jar the opening was wider than average.
